posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Alrigth, while Mick prepares his " Brawler Champion " for the heavy-weight ring of forty's, it is time for me to present you with a build that normally i don't make.

And boy, was that difficult!

Feat-starved even with 13 feats, trying to maintain a good Ac while naked, a good AB while dual-wield & good damage while holding farming tools, i went through many alterations of that build.

And still i am not satisfied!

Anyway, before my mind burns to cinders, let me give you the peck & decker. He hits with as many as 10 attacks/round with augmented from Weapon master criticals & specialization from fighter, all while maintaining a good AC in robes

and above average saves. Hit points are a tad low but if he is used correctly it won't be a problem. Frankly the worst possible scenario for him would be a low magic 20 lvl PW, but you can't have everything..
